subSections.title: Glyph origin
subSections.text:
{{Han etym}}
{{Han compound|酉|荃|t1=oxygenated functional group|t2=fragrant plant|ls=ic}}, referring to the fragrance of many aldehydes. {{zh-m|荃}} also acts as a phonetic component.

subSections.title: Etymology 1
subSections.text: From {{zh-m|荃|fragrant plant}}, referring to the fragrance of many aldehydes.

subSections.title: Compounds
subSections.text: {{zh-der|甲醛|乙醛|丙醛|丁醛|氯醛|蟻醛|香草醛|醛糖}}

subSections.title: Definitions
